39224345.review:
这款游戏的游戏性比我想象中要好得多，大致定位是一个可爱的超短休闲小游戏。

本身其实是几个非常套路的游戏，制作者很用心且巧妙的把这些和猫的特质结合在一起。玩到踹狗的猫加分多，猫讨厌洗澡的细节的时候都让我忘记了这些小游戏本身是多么老套。一个简单桌球和猫的品种结合起来也能有趣不少。

成就体系也很棒，既不难也不太容易，好几个成就拿到的时候都让人为之一振，设计的非常棒。

游戏流程总体不长，本来也就是休闲小游戏，就算是全成就估计也就是一个小时左右。玩完了还能拿出来给弟弟妹妹们玩，毕竟有可爱的猫猫的小游戏还是很受孩子们喜欢的。超出预期有意思的萌萌哒猫猫小游戏，希望制作者能做出更好的游戏。

39048406.review:
Bought this as part of a bundle during the sale just because it was cheap and I was bored, so I didn't really expect to enjoy it as much as I did. The graphics (and the game itself) is cute and simple, the music is good, and the games are easy enough to be played casually but not to the point where I lose interest quickly. I liked how the achievements were less task oriented and more like "hey, congrats on finding this thing!" and were pretty easy to get (except for 'Blub Blub', which I thought was for the bath game until I read the guide).

Didn't really like the bath game because of the controls since clicking both the left and right is difficult with my mouse and took a while to get used to the indoor racing controls (I'd say they should've kept with up and down arrows which are more intuitive, but keeping to the mouse kept with the theme with the rest of the game). The billiards game is my favorite since I also get some practice at recognizing cat breeds, but again it took a while to get used to 'right to load, left to hit'.

All in all, a good game for cat lovers to pass the time with, and worth the price tag. Will definitely go back and play more during down times when I've got nothing else to do.

如果不是重度猫奴，不推荐购买。


游戏本身是以猫为卖点的小游戏，除了画面色彩比较柔和以外感觉并没太出彩的地方。比如第一个游戏地板不是很明显，有些地方看不清到底会不会撞到桌子腿，第二个浴室游戏里猫一旦被击中，要恢复的时间很长，这段时间很可能被继续击中，第三个台球游戏击中的判断很迷，影响游戏体验。成就里有个捉蜘蛛的，不是每次切换都能遇到这个场景，而捕捉又需要预判，很难捉到，这个成就要花不少时间。另外虽然是小游戏，这个游戏的卡牌价格却很高。

总之，这游戏适合那些“只要有猫就够了”的玩家，不建议原价入，建议打折时再购买。

38560248.review:
Cat games, by cats, for cats, featuring all cats all the time. There are three mini-games, as well as a few other "hidden" activities. Everything is cute and full of cats.

The art and sound design are all great. The cats are adorable (even when scooting their butts across your carpet), and the billiards game is even educational! I tend to be more of a dog person (almost didn't pass that verification at the beginning), but it was neat seeing all the different breeds of cat.

As far as the actual gameplay goes, I'd say that the billiards game was the most interesting overall, but the racing game was probably the most fun to actually play. The racing game seemed the most polished. Bath time is a bit of a nightmare, and I didn't particularly enjoy it. Billiards had the most potential, but the controls were a little weird, and I think I would have liked if the power meter had a larger effect.

The extra puzzles and minigames were fun, but certainly not essential, all pretty minor.

If I had this on my phone, I would probably play it more than on my computer, but even still I would say it's well worth trying out, especially with the $2 price tag (or less on sale).

7/10

If you have no problem to pay the price (I guess $2 now or less) for half an hour or hour of little fun and you love cats and anything cat related, then don't take my NO as too much relevant. But this game seems to me that really profits on the "cat" theme. Ok, it is cute, but it takes fifteen minutes to see and hear almost all cute sounds or animations. If you are cat fanatic, you can spend more time with the cat billiard learning the cat breeds' names, but you see only painted head, so not really good for real world. And yes the swimming game is a bit of fun or training for reflexes. On the other hand the racing game gets too frustrating because of the slow control of the cat movements.
I only still need to find out, what to do with the computer and the "password" there, if there is some easter egg or what.
And yes, there are a lot of "easter eggs" or clickable things etc. It is probably enough for the 2 dollars, but don't expect real game.

35943421.review:
What do you get when you buy The Cat Games? *meows*
There are three main games: in one the cat runs and has to dodge some obstacles, in the other the cat is playing on the bathtub and you have to help it not to go into the water, and the last one is a billiard-like game.
Moreover, there also are three mini games, but only one of them is actually replayable.
_____

What do I think about this game? *meows*
I really liked it! Many games are easy enough, but sometimes they really have you thinking!
The sound effects are really really really cute, as well as the music.
_____

In my reviews I usually try to list the pros and the cons of the game, but now I can't think of anything negative. 
I definetely recommend this game! *meows*
ps - I got it at the -25%, yet I think the full price is fair.

If you like cats, you'll probably find this game cute and/or amusing.

It does not contain a huge amount of replayvalue, nor any kind of story, although that's neither to be expected nor necessarely important. It's a relaxing little experience with cutesy animations and cat noises. The music is rather repetetive, but should not be a big deal unless you intend to play this for long periods of time. Hearing the cat purr as it slept in the sofa and having it try to catch birds on the other side of the window made me remember the good times I had with my late cats.

This may not be a "game of the year" but it brought a smile to my face. Thank you.

hey~ 我是小茄

圖文好讀版 http://pics.ee/188zt

初玩VOD https://youtu.be/FcpbLVcBl3M

【遊戲介紹】
這是一款2D小遊戲集合體的貓咪遊戲，主畫面右邊有三個區域，當隻日常的貓會做的事。
左邊是小遊戲，也有三個，室內運動、游泳挑戰、貓咪血統台球。
操作都很簡單，只要有滑鼠就可以玩。
音樂是選用知名的，像D大調卡農、天鵝湖...
語言有兩種，english、中文，中文是簡中

【心得】
貓咪很可愛
          貓咪很可愛
                    貓咪很可愛
除了那隻白貓= =
尤其是牠在拍手(貓掌?)的時候，特別有嘲諷感..
成就很有趣，記得到處點一點，會有有趣的發現XD
小遊戲沒有終點，純粹是挑戰你能夠到多高分用的。
室內運動，很容易玩到晃神的橫向卷軸躲障礙。
游泳挑戰，要打掉所有飛來的東西，非常忙，根本是幫忙消耗滑鼠的關卡。
貓咪血統台球，考你小知識的撞球版本，順便練習記貓咪品種，貓奴必備。
在主畫面右邊的三個區域，有沙發、電腦、窗戶可以互動。
除了窗戶，其他兩個我都不知道要幹麻，可能就跟貓咪看我們的視角一樣..？(這要幹麻)

【短評】
適合喜歡貓咪、2D小品、小遊戲、成就簡單拿的人遊玩。

33959645.review:
The Cat Games is a purrfect game to play when you're looking for something calming and refreshing. I would totally recommend playing this game when it's a rainy day. The game itself has three mini-games to chose from, which isn't a lot when you think about it but it clearly disintergrates boredom for awhile. 

The mini-games include: Indoor Racing (avoiding hazards while running in the house), Swim Challenge (cat stands in the bathtub and swats away different colored objects to stay balanced), and Cat Breed Billiards (match the name with the cat and hit it in one of the openings on the sides of the table). All of the mini-games are simple enough to learn and fun to play. My favorite is Swim Challenge! Also, the achievements are pretty simple to get and not overly challenging. 

If you are looking for a cute and relaxing game to kill boredom, I recommend The Cat Games, especially if you love cats!

This is a rather short and simple game with 3 scored mini games and some little "side activities". 

It's very cute. I like the art style and the classical music fits in smoothly with the mood of the game.

Overall the game is very... 

C A T <3

=^._.^=

It doesn't offer a great deal of extended game play but it does have Trading Cards, Leaderboards  (I found that you can compare scores with other people if you access the stats via Steam client, not in game as far I could see) and 16 Achievements that aren't too difficult to earn as long as you're curious like a cat and willing to take a quick look at a walk-through guide if you're not 1337 enough to crack the cat code. 

I got a perfect game (all achievements) in about an hour and a half and probably could have done so quicker if I had tried. (And if there had been more frequent opportunities to catch those delicious bugs!)

I believe the developer is Chinese but I didn't find any translation or language issues aside from the incorrect term "catched" being used in the bird catching game, which seemed to go along nicely with the child/cat like atmosphere in the game so well that we'll just assume it was done on purpose... Because as we know, cats never do anything they did not intend to do.

As long as you love cats, and you are looking at this game more for it's aesthetic and not any kind of hardcore challenge, or long hours of game time, then you may enjoy this game.

I think this is an adorable, whimsical, casual game that could be purrrfect for humans and cats of all ages.

33114325.review:
[h1] Bonito, simples e... FOFO! [/h1]

[i] The Cat Games como o nome já diz trata-se dos pequenos felinos domésticos que conhecemos, envolvendo mini-games simples e viciantes com um toque de fofura. [/i]

[b] Gameplay [/b]

A gameplay é muito simples, sendo que teremos que utilizar somente o mouse, não há como fazer a troca por outras teclas e o suporte ao controle é inexistente.

[b] Gráficos[/b]

São agradáveis a visão, não contendo uma grande variedade de cores mas ainda sim muito bem feitos para o padrão de jogos de mesmo preço.

[b] Trilha sonora e efeitos sonoros [/b]

A trilha sonora é muito agradável de se ouvir (me fazendo ao ponto de abaixar o volume do Spotify para ouvi-lá); o jogo lhe permite ouvir uma demo das músicas nas opções; os efeitos sonoros são bons, os sons do gato dormindo, ronronando e etc, mas alguns sons são um pouco chatos de se ouvir, na minha percepção alguns sons ficaram muito agudos e se repetidos muitas vezes não causa um incomodo mas se torna chato.

[b] Conquistas [/b]

“É jogo de 5 reais, conquistas fáceis” meu pensamento antes de joga-lo; elas não são difíceis, mas requerem que o jogador realmente jogue e experimente todos os mini-games, ele conta com 16 conquistas, e se você for azarado como eu terá que no mínimo jogar 2 horas do game (se for ver é quase nada, mas né) pois não trata apenas de fazer uma ação (algumas conquistas funcionam como no jogo Zup de apenas clicar em partes do menu) mas há conquistas que você terá que realmente esperar e ter paciência, um exemplo é a conquista Debugging aonde objetivo é pegar um inseto que aparecerá em sua tela em momentos aleatórios entre as transições do menu para algum mini-game ou para o Scoreboard, e não é tão fácil, mas não tem muito segredo.

[b] Cartas colecionáveis [/b]

As cartas na época desta análise estão num preço muito bom para venda, podendo se o jogo tiver sido comprado em alguma promoção lhe render um profit

[b] Opinião geral [/b]

Um jogo bonito e divertido que conta com uma mecânica simples de gameplay, com sons agradáveis, personagens fofos, conquistas relativamente fáceis e com cartas que vão lhe render um profit se o jogo tiver sido comprado em alguma promoção.

Ps: Meu gato ficou vidrado na tela do monitor quando os gatos apareciam e miavam

33061260.review:
The Cat Games is a very casual, easygoing game that's intended for cat lovers. If you are not a cat person, you would not enjoy The Cat Games.

The game is controlled entirely with the mouse, except for the computer puzzle code which requires a text input. There are three main games to play; Indoor Racing, Swim Challenge and Cat Breed Billards, as well as several other minigames involving napping, leaping at birds outside the window, and viewing cat pictures on a computer.

Indoor Racing isn't necessarily a [i]cat racing[/i] game per-se, but a randomly generated obstacle course that you guide a cat through. Swim Challenge requires you to click on various objects being flung in the cat's direction as to not knock the cat into the bathtub. Cat Breed Billards is a billards game where you have to sink the cat ball corresponding to the breed you're given; you don't get penalized for sinking the wrong cats, but you get a large point bonus if you sink the correct cat breed first.

Ultimately, The Cat Games is rather short, simple and sweet; I managed to obtain all the achievements in about an hour of gameplay. I would recommend The Cat Games for casual gamers who love cats. Having said that, you may not enjoy this game if you're a serious gamer, or you don't necessarily like cats.

[b]You becoming a cat is now the real thing![/b]

First of all, you must appreciate the simple and cute design, as you turn the game on.
I suppose, that the cat lovers & owners will appreciate the diversity of the game more than the other mortals :) But it doesn’t mean you should have less fun!

[b]So what is this game about?[/b]
Game is controlled by LMB and RMB easily. You can expect three main games named [i]Indoor Racing, Swim Challenge[/i] and [i]Cat Breed Billiards[/i]

[b]Indoor Racing:[/b] Run around the living room, try to avoid the da*n furniture in your way and don’t hesitate to annoy the dog, by accidentally bumping into him or wipe your butt while running over the carpet.

[b]Swim Challenge:[/b] The adrenaline of falling or not falling into the bath-tub full of water, right?! Smash the stupid soaps, sponges, hairbrushes and moar! Beware of shower and bubbles. Those could be fatal to your furry coat :)

[b]Cat Breed Billiards:[/b] I like the motto [i]Learn something new every day,[/i] so why not to learn some cat breeds while trying to nudge the ball into the hole?

The game includes even more funny stuff like trying to catch a bird behind the window or crack the mystery of cat dreams. Every mini game unlocks an achievement for you and it’s not a trouble to complete the whole game at 100%, especially with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=891288149]this well-written guide.[/url]

[b]Pros:[/b]
* Cats
* Cats
* Cats
* Easy navigation and controlling
* Cute and simple graphics
* The Idea in general
* Training your reflexes, learning something new (if you didn’t know before)
* 100% achievements possibility

[b]Cons:[/b]
Found NONE!

[b]Summary:[/b]
This game definitely deserves [b]100%[/b] for the idea and possibility to complete 100% of the achievements. If someone doesn’t like the Product Placement achievement – so what. The creator has to eat something, to be able to create even more great games in the future and it doesn’t irritates me at all. The game worths the full price and what’s different about this game from the other cheap ones – there is always a score to be beaten, so if you will be in the mood, you will possibly come back and play it time by time.
Thanks to M.Hanka for this catmazing game.

31669574.review:
这是一款单人动作休闲游戏，具有不错的画面和简单的操作，具有steam排行榜，由Liu Lidan发行，M.Hanka开发，发行于2017年3月24日。

主界面上可以看到3个小游戏，以及各种图标，图标都可以点击，用来解锁相关成就。
点击沙发，进入梦境，由内到外点击猫 蝴蝶 鱼 爪印 可以解锁成就 美梦
点击电脑，会看到很多猫猫运动员，在运动员中包含了密码线索，输入ENIGMEOW解锁成就。
点击窗户，可以捕捉小鸟。
主界面放置切换后，可以捉虫，类似捉鸟。

室内运动 挑战你的反应力，跑跑更健康
规则
持续按鼠标左键 猫猫向上移动
持续按鼠标右键 猫猫向下移动
跑到地板上那些小障碍物上 会短时间失去控制
每收集一个小黄鸭可以获得10分
通过一对旗子可以获得30分
撞到一只瞌睡狗可以获得20分 会短时间失去控制
通过白毛毯擦屁屁可以得分 每次2分 要走直线
撞到家具 游戏结束
平面跑酷游戏，吃道具，互动，加分，躲避家具不要撞上去，鼠标简单操作不是很难，熟练操作以后可以拿很高的分数。

游泳挑战 测试你的神经韧性，给主子洗澡可比登天还难
在黄色玩具上点击左键。你从黄色玩具上获得10分。
在粉色玩具上点击左键。你从粉色玩具上获得20分。
在蓝色玩具上同时点击左键和右键。你从蓝色玩具上获得30分。
别被撞到，否则你会失去平衡。
要恢复平衡，请把爪子举到身体上方。
注意喷头！沐浴开始钱，喷头会震动一秒。当喷头震动时你点击它，会获得50粉。
不要被泡泡圈到。
如果你完全失去平衡，你会掉进浴缸，挑战结束，时间会加到你的分数上。
猫猫位置固定，需要点击消除飞来的各种道具，和及时躲避上面的喷水。

猫咪血统台球 挑战你的物理和数学知识，以及对猫猫血统的学习能力
每次游戏会有3个问题。猫咪的血统在台球桌下面的窗口显示。你必须吧正确血统猫咪的球打入一个球洞。
推白球来撞击。
移动鼠标 围绕目标
按住右键 调整力度
点击左键 击球
每个问题都有时间限制。限制时间内将正确的球计入球洞，获得100分。剩余时间（x3）将加到你的总分里。
如果第一个入洞的球正确：额外加100分
有一个球洞是标记的。
将正确的球击入标记球洞：额外加100分
其他球击入球洞也获得10分。但小心这两种球!
如果这两种球或白球入洞，那么问题结束。
台球游戏，配合着有关猫猫的知识问答，多玩几次就可以熟记各种猫猫的图案，同时里面也随机刷出特殊猫猫，进洞可以解锁特殊成就。

游戏具有好友排名系统，你和你的好友在三项小游戏中的积分，都会记录在排行榜上，排行榜上的气球点击可以解锁成就。

游戏同时具有各项设置，可以让玩家更好的体验游戏。

这是一款关于猫猫的游戏

30968305.review:
The Cat Games es un juego perfectamente ambientado en el mundo gatuno. Se basa en tres minijuegos de diferentes formatos, en el primero deberemos esquivar obstáculos y ganar puntos en una carrera por el salón de la casa, en el segundo utilizaremos nuestra zarpa para atrapar patitos de goma o detener jabones que nos tirarán a la bañera y en el tercero deberemos colar en un billar gatuno al gato correcto por el agujero correcto.

La ambientación del juego con los sonidos del ronroneo del gato, del maullido y demás sonidos crea una atmósfera agradable para los amantes de los gatos. Además los minijuegos están unido a un menú en el que podemos interactuar parcialmente y desbloquear numerosos secretos, y el menú se une a los minijuegos con clips aleatorios que son como miniminijuegos bonus.

Juego recomendado para cualquier amante de los gatos.

По-сути эта забавная игра является симулятром или буднями кота, можно половить птичек, посмотреть сны, противостоять щёткам и шампуням в ванне, при этом лопая пузыри и ловя уточек с звёздами, поверьте, дело не из лёгких)))) Так же можно поиграть в своеобразный кошачий бильярд, где нужно запоминать породы котиков, и нужную породу загонять в лунку (потом можно и ветеринаром смело идти работать), ещё очень интересный раннер, и я бы сказал что он не из лёгких, ведь довольно таки трудно собирать уточек, кувыркаться по собакам (как бы это смешно не звучало), пробегать рядом с флажками, скользить или катиться по ковру (что выглядит довольно таки смешно), и при этом постараться не задевать лишние предметы и не влететь в шкаф, диван, или ещё куда (спросите у своего кота, он тоже любит так делать).
 Итог: игрушка весёлая, пару часов убить можно, даже за раз, ибо есть люди, которые хотят побить рекорд везде, где только можно, музычка весёлная, но её мало, анимация и графика простая, но прикольная, выделяется на фоне других игр. В общем игрушка приколная, своих денюшек стоит, идеально для гостей с детьми, хотя там и взрослый не долго продержится)))))

喝咖啡的那个成就，想要完成，可以去选项里面打开“热咖啡”这个选项，然后再回到游戏首页点击桌上的杯子，就会跳成就了。同理，cat或者猫这个成就也可以在选项里面点出来。
魂猫、面具、鹰头猫都可以在台球中完成，只要把相应的打进球洞里就行啦~
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
其实我刚玩这款游戏的时候，内心是有点崩溃的，我其实也算是有点急性子吧……
然后我就去刷了个剧，刷完虐剧后，急需要治疗，于是我又打开了这款游戏。
好的，我成功被治疗到了。
我觉得猫咪屁股擦过地毯有一种迷之快感……
就是那种刚大号完的不擦屁股直接在地毯上滑……（这样想想我就迷之兴奋，仿佛自己成了这样的喵，满屋子往地毯上摩擦摩擦，疯狂滴摩擦……）
菊花在地毯上这样擦过去，会不会有一种毛躁感？
还有啊从睡着的狗上滚过去也好萌啊
滚过去之后感觉内心涌起一种“嘻嘻，愚蠢的狗狗”这样的迷之优越感。
抓鸟，让我深深明白，我这样的喵，如果在野外，不出三天就会放弃抓鸟，直接选择吃虫子……
恩，蜘蛛真美味啊，一爪一个。
洗澡那个泡泡也挺有趣，脑补了下：我坐在水龙头上，愚蠢的主人朝我丢东西，我拿起爪子拍，嗨呀有泡泡，哇好好玩啊，我拍我拍我拍拍拍，哎呀爪子不听使唤了，哎呀沐浴露正中我脑袋了，哎呀我掉进了水里，愚蠢的主人哈哈大笑起来……我成了一只落汤喵，好气哦，等会去主人的地毯上蹭菊花吧。
我的萌点也是奇怪，我放弃治疗了。
顺便猫咪的呼噜声大好评，听着就感觉满满的幸福感。啊仿佛现在就有一只猫在我身边似的呜呜呜呜。
另外成就的图标也很好看=w=

30731030.review:
¡Un buen juego para los amantes de los gatos!

Aún así, es el mejor juego de gatos que hay en Steam? Yo diría que no, pero por el precio que tiene merece la pena para echar una tarde. Tiene varios minijuegos que son entretenidos. Y los logros son bastante sencillos e intuitivos, basta con explorar un poco el juego y prestar atención a los detalles.

El juego se divide en 3 minijuegos principales:

-En el primero, es una "carrera" 2D por un salón esquivando y recogiendo items para subir nuestra puntuación.
-El segundo es un billar, donde debes meter la bola correspondiente a la raza de gato que te pide.
-Y el tercero es una bañera en la que debemos eliminar los objetos que se acercan a nosotros para tirarnos al agua y, a la vez, clickar en juguetes y objetos de ducha varios para ganar puntuación.

Luego, hay algún minijuego oculto como la contraseña, cazar pájaros desde la ventana, el sueño del gato o cazar cucarachas.

En resumen, ¿merece la pena? Si, si eres un amante de los gatos, tiene muchos gags divertidos que todo dueño de gato reconoce. No si buscas algo profundo, el juego no da mucho de si porque en 1h (o antes) ya has visto todo lo que ofrece.

Nota: 7/10

30711841.review:
This is a simple game and you could argue if it is worth any money because it's definitely comparable to (free) online flash games. 

The game has 3 main minigames where you avoid furniture by going up and down using the left and right mouse button collecting as many points in the process possible.

The other game has you 'fighting' for your 'life' in the bathroom. A series of washing/bathroom related stuff get thrown at you and you have to get rid of them before they hit you and knock you in the tub, you won't get any points for knocking stuff away except for the objects that jump out of the tub.

And finally we have Cat Trivia Billiards where you play a simple game of billiards where you're shown a certain cat race and have to get rid of that one for maximum points (the balls have cat heads on them).

Besides that you have a dream sequence where you can connect 3 symbols and get an achievement, you can also catch birds outside and figure out a password for some more achievements.

The game can be completed in 10 minutes if you don't care about achievements and play it slowly...
So is it worth it? Not really but complaining for spending 2 bucks isn't worth it either so enjoy it if you have it and try to get the most out of it, or ask for a refund when you've completed everything.

Extra: one of my cats liked this game 'tho, the sounds got her looking at my screen and she tried to catch some of the stuff that appeared so it certainly is a cat game...

I think the thing I enjoyed most about The Cat Games is the level of cat humor put into the game.  There's little additions here and there that, if you're paying attention and see them, will definitely get a great chuckle out of you.  For example, make sure you check out the "Settings" menu,  even if you're a "default" settings kind of guy/gal.

I guess the end of the line with a game review comes down to this:  Is the game fun to play?  Personally, I had a lot of fun and many laughs playing The Cat Games!

40531914.review:
I rate the game The Cat Games 2.5/5. Bad overall though at the low cost of only $1.99 it might almost be adequate for the price.

So far as I can tell this is a game that should ideally be installed on a phone or other computer with an extremely mobile, durable monitor (ideally with a touch screen interface) if possible so that a cat can play the games (so you don't have to). Indeed, I think a cat would likely get more out of the 5 or so simple games and nice purring sounds which this collection features. One of the games (the one where you try to catch birds by tapping on the screen) is so absurdly simple it may really be designed for cats.

Overall, the games generally feel pointless though the overall game design is very cute and the sound is pretty good (especially the purring sound). If this game isn't designed for cats to play it may instead be for extremely young children but I expect even they will probably get bored with this game collection quite quickly. If you don't have REALLY young children though to play this game for you, this 2 dollar game may still be a bit over priced. The game does work quite well and it is very cute but it gets really boring really fast. It's too bad really because a collection featuring larger number of games (rather than just 4 or 5) or a single, more complex game with this same cute aesthetic could've been pretty good even for a higher price. As it stands however, I cannot recommend this game, at least not to anyone over the age of 7.

40203293.review:
Thumbs up here. Discovering all the little Easter Eggs in the game is the best part, although trying to catch birds and bugs can be wonky with detection. Cat Racing is by far the best of the three core games with Billiards being maddingly frustrating due to a complete lack of physics behind that game. I love the idea of the Cat Billards, which also teaches you about cat breeds, but playing it was profanity inducing at times. The third game, which is entitled, Swim Challenge, is well done as well. Left click the mouse to catch something oif one color, right for a different color and both mouse buttons for the third. It's easy to understand but can get challenging when there is a lot of stuff on the screen. 

I enjoyed everything about this game except for the billiards and easily got my $1.33 out of the game.

40105001.review:
Это лучшая игра, в которую мне доводилось играть когда-либо.
По пунктам:
1. Тут прекрасный сюжет. Он переплюнет любую мафию/гта/халф лайфы/небо/аллаха
2. Идеальная графическая проработка 3d моделей, что говорит о профессиональность разработки, студии, нанятой за большие деньги, и, возможно, годов труда.
3. Физика на высоте. Даже в специализированных симуляторах разработчикам не удавалось передать ощущения погружения, чего нельзя сказать об этой игре.

39730285.review:
Ох, это одна из самых странных игр, в которые мне довелось играть. Сразу можно сказать, что она будет интересна любому ребёнку или любителю кошек. Для обычных игроков игра больше будет интересна в плане достижений, так как получать их действительно увлекательно и к тому же примерно за час можно все получить. И стоит упомянуть карточки, так как например мне выпали такие, стоимость которых окупила игру, тем более что купил по скидке :)

Головоломки совсем несложные, всего представлено три (четыре) мини-игры и две головоломки + очень интересные ачивки. Цель всех мини-игр набрать максимальное количество очков.

В итоге, если у вас есть дети, купите им эту игру - она стоит немного и её не назовёшь "для тупых", нет, как раз для детей она будет даже в некотором роде развивающая, для взрослого человека она конечно слишком простая, но вот для ребёнка лет 5 будет самое оно. 
И если вы любите котов и вам не жалко потратить 1,59$ (а скорее для вас она стоит ещё меньше), то берите и не относитесь к ней слишком серьёзно.
